name: Charles Crystal Adventure
description:
Title: Charles Crystal Adventure

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

This game was built using Lego Microgame Tutorial. It follows Adventure Boy Charles as he traverses through the level trying to collect green crystals! However there will be enemies to fight and puzzles to solve! This is quite a short game but I hope you enjoy!

Instructions:

The controls are quite simple. Move Charles using WSAD and Spacebar to Jump. The goal/objective of the game is to obtain all the crystals found in the level.

Game Design Team
